info.title: About the project
info.text: A small web application written to optimize your working time. The application is written in Vue 3 (Composition API) using Vuetify components. All session data is stored in Local Storage. You can view session histories and comment on each of the session segments. In the future, it is planned to optimize the code, add new methods that help optimize the developer's time. Thank you for your time!
